General.Name: Hotel Sahid Jaya Tbk
General.Description: PT Hotel Sahid Jaya International Tbk engages in the hotel business in Indonesia. It also operates and manages serviced apartments; and offers management and other services for hotel and tourism sectors. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Hotel Sahid Jaya International Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Empu Sahid International.
